synopsis: Suning graduated from college, after 99 days of delivery delivery, finally awakened the courier gods  system! As long as the delivery, there will be godly rewards! "Dingdong, congratulate the host to complete a special delivery, reward one billion!" "Dingdong, congratulations to the host for completing a special delivery, rewarding a Lamborghini Poison!" "Dingdong, congratulations to the host for completing a special delivery, rewarding a three-star Michelin restaurant." "Dingdong, congratulations to the host for completing a special delivery, rewarding ten houses." "Dingdong, congratulations to the host for completing a special delivery, rewarding 30% shares of Penguin Group." ......... A certain reporter interview. Reporter: "Hello Mr. Su, how can I become a hundred billionaire like you." Su Ning: "This is simple, earn 900 billion less." All the reporters were petrified and in the wind.
